scripts.check: npm run frontend:check && npm run backend:check
scripts.dev: export VIBE_KANBAN_ASSET_MODE=prod && export HOST=0.0.0.0 && export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) npm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: DISABLE_WORKTREE_ORPHAN_CLEANUP=1 RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -w crates -x 'run --bin server'
scripts.test:e2e:ghost: nohup pnpm test:e2e:ci > e2e-playwright.log 2>&1 & echo $! > e2e-playwright.pid && echo 'E2E started as PID '$(cat e2e-playwright.pid)
